name: The Night Before Shitmas
description:
Starring voice actors from The Outer Worlds!

It is the day before Christmas. Santa's elves should be hard at work, making the final presents and preparing the sleigh, but something's wrong... All the elves are sick! They all have a very major case of....um.... the Explosive Diarrhea. But the presents must still be finished!

That's where you come in! Make the presents! Quick! All of you! Make so many presents that you'll get lost in them! Do the things! And, maybe even steal materials from your fellow elves to further your own present count! ANYTHING FOR PROGRESS!
